ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Transport of H. GLENN RAINBIRD, O.C., of Belleville, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
